hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Get a job cvs pharmacy transfer prescription I’d love to see Washington go into Oregon (which has no sales tax) and sue vendors in Oregon who sell online but have no physical presence (nexus) in Washington. My gosh, Washingtonians go by the thousands across the river to Oregon to shop in cities on or near the Columbia. Go to a Costco or Home Depot, or JoAnn, or Fred Myers, etc. sometime at stores near the River and count the Washington plates. Go to Ontario, Oregon some time and count the Idaho plates. Sue a vendor in Oregon who has no physical presence Washington or Idaho? Not likely. Same is true in other states where there is a differential in sales tax. Go and count he “foreign” plates.
